server_count.sql: select count(*) from server where status = 0;

tc_server_count.sql: select count(*) from server where status = 0 and cloudType = 'TC';

uc_server_count.sql: select count(*) from server where status = 0 and cloudType = 'UC';

randA.sql: select count(*) from server where status = 0 and cloudType = 'UC';
